summary: TAKATA RECALL"  I RECEIVED A RECALL A YEAR AGO THIS MONTH REGARDING THE AIRBAG SITUATION.  THE DEALERSHIP IS NOT CONCERNED AND HAS NOT RECEIVED ANYTHING TO REPLACE IT.  THE SEAL ON MY DASH HAS OPENED UP EXPOSING SOME FOAM.  I AM CONCERNED FOR ANYONE TO SIT IN THAT SEAT.  I WANT TO KNOW WHEN THIS MATTER WILL BE RESOLVED.  IT IS RIDICULOUS THAT THEY HAVE NOT BOTHERED TO FIX THIS CONSIDERING IT IS DANGEROUS.  FORD NEEDS TO STEP UP.  I WANT SOME ANSWERS!!!
